WorkItem.Description:
Kavan, thank you for your work on issue #10244. I'm opening another issue because since May my gear has moved on and the sequencer still gives a score under 100 for me using Brutallus fight parameters. Firstly I'd like to request a change to the Heroism Control options. Due to fire mage(s) in my group, heroism is popped at 20% exactly. So it's nice to know what would be optimal for me, but I'll never be the one deciding, and it makes quite a fundamental difference to the accuracy of Rawr. Could you include a fourth option, namely "exactly 20%"? Secondly, as you will see from the attached file, the mana gem+SCB combo still fails to trigger under certain conditions. I understand it's a tricky problem to solve, so I can only hope you find some unexpected inspiration to revisit the code.
